author: Emma Roth
title: Apple reportedly cut a deal to get cleaner Amazon pages
description: Apple and Amazon have a deal that prevents ads from appearing on product pages and search results for new Apple products, like the latest iPhone, MacBook, or iPad, according to Insider.
